summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to solid waste taxation; amending Titles 5 and 21 of the Seattle Municipal Code to add and modify definitions; deleting a duplicative tax exemption provision; amending provisions relating to the taxation of solid wastes; deleting the tonnage tax on the collection of solid waste effective January 1, 2010; increasing the transfer tax rate effective January 1, 2010; deleting an obsolete credit provision; and amending sections 5.30.020, 5.30.025, 5.30.035, 5.30.040, 5.30.050, 5.45.090, 5.45.100, 5.48.055, 21.36.016, and deleting section 5.48.072, respectively, of the Seattle Municipal Code.
